io.netty.channel

Interface ServerChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeMap, Channel, Comparable<Channel>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SctpServerChannel, ServerDomainSocketChannel, ServerSocketChannel, UdtServerChannel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEpollServerChannel, AbstractServerChannel, EpollServerDomainSocketChannel, EpollServerSocketChannel, LocalServerChannel, NioSctpServerChannel, NioServerSocketChannel, NioUdtAcceptorChannel, NioUdtByteAcceptorChannel, NioUdtMessageAcceptorChannel, OioSctpServerChannel, OioServerSocketChannel

    public interface ServerChannel
extends Channel
    A Channel that accepts an incoming connection attempt and creates its child Channels by accepting them. ServerSocketChannel is a good example.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.Channel

        Channel.Unsafe
